scripts.clear:pool: php bin/console cache:pool:clear cache.doctrine.orm.default.metadata; php bin/console cache:pool:clear cache.doctrine.orm.default.result; php bin/console cache:pool:clear cache.doctrine.orm.default.query
scripts.doctrine: diff and create / updateTable: php bin/console doctrine:migrations:diff; php bin/console doctrine:migrations:migrate

scripts.delete env local and migrations: cd src; rm -rf Migrations;  mkdir Migrations; cd .. ; rm -rf .env.local; rm -rf .env.rivatour.local
scripts.updateAll: npm run "delete env local and migrations"; npm run "chown data";npm run "update apache conf";rm -rf var/cache/*
